data.title: Katalyst Data Management
data.meta_description: Katalyst digitizes all subsurface data formats with services including tape transcription, data scanning, digitizing, metadata capture & cloud services
data.text:
The following tape and file formats are just a selection of the geophysical and geological (G&G) subsurface data formats that are supported by Katalyst Data Management for the oil and gas industry. Associated digitization services include tape transcription, data copying, data cutouts, scanning, digitizing, metadata capture and cloud services.

Seismic Data Formats

SEGA, SEGB, and SEGC

SEGD, all 00xx variations

SEGX

SEGY

Sercel SN328, SN338, SN348

SSL Leach

SDS1010

Western Redcor

Mandrel

Petty Ray SDR 2/3

HR6300

GeoCorr I through IV

Phoenix I

TIAC-9k, TIAC-10k

GeoSystems

TIMAP

Wisdom

Western Internal

Western Code 1 through 4

SSV8

SIPMAP

DFS IV & DFS III

Digicon

H.D.D.R. – 2000, 4000

SDS-1010, SDS-1011

Russian (I-2,R-2, I-4, R-4)

Sercel

CGG internal

Unix/Tar/Cpio

Disco – Vax, Convex, IBM

Amoco, Conoco

Exxon, Mobil

Fairfield, Shell

Floppy/Disk – Bison, Kingdom, SEG-P1, SEG-D, SEG-Y

Other – client specific

7 Track Formats

Western REDCOR

Petty Ray SDR 2/3

CGG

PRAKLA DB66

PRAKLA DIGSEI

Sercel SN327

Geocom

DIPMETER HDT
